price: 假若不归信的人们与你们交战，他们必定失败，而且不能发现一个保护者，也不能发现一个援助者。
arabic: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaw qātalakumu alladhīna kafarū lawallawū al-adbāra thumma lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
